times_cited.description: Number of citations. Does not support emptiness filters

mesh_terms.description: Medical Subject Heading terms as used in PubMed.

open_access.description: Open Access status for publication. Deprecated in favor of `open_access_categories`
open_access.long_description:
**DEPRECATED in favor of `open_access_categories`**

        Open Access field data for publications can make reference to information on the host location and the record version.

        **Open Access host location**

        Host location information can describes if the document is either hosted by the publisher or in an institutional repository.

           * **Open access - publisher** means the linked full-text version is served by the article's publisher.
           * **Open access - repository** means the linked full-text version is served by an Open Access repository.

        **Record Version**

        Record version refers to the version of the content as defined by Unpaywall (see `Unpaywall Data Format <https://unpaywall.org/data-format>`_)

           * **Open access - submitted** means the linked full-text version is not yet peer-reviewed.
           * **Open access - accepted** means the linked full-text version is peer-reviewed, but lacks publisher-specific formatting.
           * **Open access - published** means the linked full-text version is the version of record.

recent_citations.description: Number of citations received in the last two years. Does not support emptiness filters

proceedings_title.description: Title of a conference corresponding to documents that are `type` of "proceeding"

referenced_pubs.description: Dimensions publication id for documents referencing another document

relative_citation_ratio.description: Relative citation performance of an article when compared to others in its area of research. Does not support emptiness filters

open_access_categories.description: Open Access category for publication. Filtering on values is case sensitive.
open_access_categories.long_description:
Open Access category data for publications values:

        * `oa_all`: Article is freely available
        * `gold_pure`: Version Of Record (VOR) is free under an open licence from a full OA journal
        * `gold_hybrid`: Version Of Record (VOR) is free under an open licence in a paid-access journal
        * `gold_bronze`: Freely available on publisher page, but without an open licence
        * `green_pub`: Free copy of published version in an OA repository
        * `green_acc`: Free copy of accepted version in an OA repository
        * `green_sub`: Free copy of submitted version, or where version is unknown, in an OA repository
        * `closed`: No freely available copy has been identified

date_inserted.description: Date when publication was inserted into Dimensions

terms.description: Extracted terms. See :ref:`for-terms` regarding searching terms vs phrases

type.description: Publication type (article, chapter, proceeding, monograph, preprint or book)

author_affiliations.description: List of JSON lists of researchers' first and last names and affiliations

references.description: Dimensions publication id for documents referencing another document

altmetric.description: Altmetric attention score. Does not support emptiness filters

field_citation_ratio.description: Relative citation performance of article when compared to similarly aged articles in its area of research. Does not support emptiness filters

journal_lists.description: Independent grouping of journals outside of Dimensions

recent_citations_total.name: recent_citations_total
recent_citations_total.description: For a given article, in a given year, the number of citations accrued in the last two year period. Single value stored per document, year window rolls over in July.

title_language.description: ISO 639-1 language code used in title

date_inserted.description: Date when publication was inserted into Dimensions

researcher_details.description: Additional details about researchers including affiliations and role

resulting_publication_ids.description: Resulting Publication IDs. Deprecated, use `publications` field `supporting_grant_ids` instead

reference_ids.description: Patents which are cited by this patent

date_inserted.description: Date when publication was inserted into Dimensions

date.description: Date when the patent was filed

cpc.description: Cooperative Patent Classification number for a patent

ipcr.description: International Patent Classification Reform number for a patent

organizations.description: IDs of any organizations involved in any way, e.g. as sponsors or collaborators

date_inserted.description: Date when publication was inserted into Dimensions

investigators.description: JSON with names, titles, & roles (no ids) of involved researchers for display purposes

current_research_org.description: The most recent research organization linked to the researcher

research_orgs.description: All research organizations linked to the researcher

obsolete.description: Indicates researcher ID status. 0 means that the researcher ID is still active, 1 means that the researcher ID is no longer valid. See redirect field for further information on invalid researcher IDs.

redirect.description: Indicates status of obsolete researcher ID. Empty means that the researcher ID was deleted. Otherwise ID provided means that is the new id into which the obsolete one was redirected. If multiple values are available, it means that the original researcher ID was split into multiple IDs.
